mdRecord.dcterms:title: Wyoming Valley Grammar School, exterior|general view
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
Wright, Frank Lloyd (American architect, 1867-1959) [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "Located on Route 23, the school is 2 miles past Hillside Home School...This school is very small, approximately 3,000 square feet, and contains only two classrooms and an assembly hall that includes two auxiliary rooms. Like so many of Wright's public buildings, the main entrance is at the center of the composition." -- Heinz, Frank Lloyd Wright Field Guide, 1996 [work]
